name: Papou Valley of Spirits Remastered
description:
Papou Valley of Spirits Remastered is a remake of the game "Papou Valley of Spirits" made by Brondold (Brondold - itch.io). It's an RPG where you play as a soul smuggler that need to find 5 lost spirits to guide them to eternal peace. Unfortunaletly, it's not an easy task when evil ones try to get in the way !

Use Z, Q, S and D to move and left click to attack.

Link to the Github project : Danlikesdelion/Papou-Valley-of-Spirits-Remastered (github.com)
